info.name: LastPass Dark (CSharpner)
info.description: Dark theme for LastPass.com.  NOTE: THIS DOES NOT WORK FOR THE BROWSER EXTENSION!  ONLY FOR THE WEBSITE!  This is because security features of browsers do NOT let extensions modify other extensions.  Sorry guys!  No way around this!
info.additionalInfo: This is based on the work of hackerman (https://userstyles.org/styles/174483/lastpass) who did almost all of this.  I fixed a couple of glaring ommissions.
